title: Yucatan Mayan Heritage Manor Stay with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Spa Credit
description:
Have the unique pleasure of staying in an 18th-century Mayan manor, now a beautifully restored hotel that showcases its rich cultural heritage with dark exposed timbers, intricately tiled flooring and soaring high ceilings. Families are welcome to experience the charm of this enchanting estate, perfect for both relaxing and exploring the archaeological wonders of Chichén Itzá and Dzibilchaltún.

Spend time lazing on a hammock suspended over the palm-lined pool, or enjoy a relaxing massage at the spa. For dining, Restaurante San José invites you to explore a mouthwatering blend of regional cuisine, offering Mexican comfort food with ingredients sourced from the estate's own orchards. At night, the restaurant is romantically thrown into candlelight.
location_description: Hacienda San Jose Cholul, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Km 30 Carretera Tixkokob-Tekanto, Tixkokob, Yucatan 97470, Mexico
